title: Networking Basics on the Command Line
description: @Heart of code-dome! What's an IP address and how do you get it? How does your computer manage to reach the whole world? How can you check what part of it went wrong? This hands-on workshop will give a basic overview of some networking concepts and tools, such as ip, ping, and traceroute. Then you will have time to try out the tools for yourself. Please bring a laptop.
